entry.title: Re
entry.summary: Re Jake Chervinsky: "Crypto people shouldn't support Elon buying Twitter because centralization" 🙄 Meh. It's already a centralized company. Elon buying it doesn't stop anyone from building decentralized alternatives. It might make Twitter better. Liking crypto doesn't mean hating everything else.
